description: I am a self-motivated, personable person who takes pride in the work that I do. I am enthusiastic about cultivating not only interpersonal skills but also skills that are valuable to the company.
keyskills: Able to see situations from multiple perspectives
Able to understand and communicate well with the team
Able to identify what a product needs
Able to develop a learner's mindset
Able to keep up with advances in the industry

actions: Trained more than 10 employees on company workflow and best practices
Prepared and served over 50 cups of drinks daily to customers
Made latte art of at least 5 designs
Catered to customer's concerns and issues throughout the shift
Maintained a clean workspace throughout the shift
Handled high customer traffic even during Movement Control Order (MCO) to make sure all customers are seated properly according to government SOP
Always sensitive to customer needs even during peak hours
Catered to customer's issues and concerns throughout the shift
Able to gracefully resolve issues with customers without conflict

projects.name: Hotel Booking Engine
contributions: Designed a booking system for hotels with PHP, MYSQL and JQuery
Refactored existing codebase to produce a new UI and backend for the booking system
Worked with existing APIs as well as produced new ones to tailor to the system's needs

projects.name: Customer Manager System
contributions: Project done to learn OOP PHP, fetch API and VueJS.
Developed a REST API with JWT authentication using vanilla PHP.
Developed frontend CMS UI/UX with VueJS.
Backend database developed with MYSQL and hosted with XAMPP.

projects.name: Property Value Prediction
contributions: Built a Random Forest Regression model to predict the future prices of real estate.
Built a web scraper using Selenium to get property information from websites.
Researched on various types of models to be used for prediction.
Performed intensive data cleaning to be used for prediction.
Performed data analysis to select the best parameters for prediction.
Performed model evaluation to determine the accuracy of the model using various metrics.

projects.name: Image Classification
contributions: Built Random Forest Classifier and Convolutional Neural Network models to classify animal habitats from images.
Researched on various types of deep learning and machine learning models to be used for prediction.
Built a training dataset containing labels for over 500 different images of animals.
Saved various models for future comparison using pickle.
Performed image processing using different edge detection algorithms to improve ML model accuracy.
Performed hyper parameter tuning to improve DL model accuracy.
Performed model evaluation to determine the accuracy of the model using various metrics.
